SEARCH
Package it.astromark.authentication.service

Class JWTService

java.lang.Object
it.astromark.authentication.service.JWTService
@Service public class JWTService extends Object
Service for managing JWT tokens. Handles operations such as token generation, validation, and claims extraction.

    • validateToken

      public boolean validateToken(String jwtToken, SchoolUser schoolUser) throws org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException
      Validates the JWT token against the provided user.
      Parameters:
      jwtToken - the JWT token
      schoolUser - the user to validate against
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if validation fails
